DOC.brief_summary: Investigating the perioperative effect of moxonidine. In a randomized double-blind fashion, patients undergoing vascular surgery will receive moxonidine 0.2 mg or placebo from the day before surgery until day 4 after surgery. Holter-EKG for 48 h, starting just before surgery. Repeated 12-lead EKG, measurements of Troponin I and BNP, clinical visitations, follow-up interviews at 6 and 12 months
DOC.brief_title: Moxonidine in Patients Undergoing Vascular Surgery
DOC.criteria: abdominal aortic or peripheral vascular surgery unstable angina, severe symptomatic heart failure (NYHA IV) systolic blood pressure at rest < 100 mmHg bradycardia (<50/min) higher grade AV heart block creatinine clearance < 30 ml/min pregnancy no consent
